mapper.insert:
insert into exercise_system.question_list(question_count, opt_max, res_max, grade, school_id, question_list_number, question_list_identifier, sign_time, score) values
(#{entity.questionCount}, #{entity.optMax}, #{entity.resMax}, #{entity.grade}, #{entity.schoolId}, #{entity.questionListNumber}, #{entity.questionListIdentifier}, #{entity.signTime}, #{entity.score})

insert into exercise_system.question_list(question_count, opt_max, res_max, grade, school_id, question_list_number, question_list_identifier, sign_time, score) values
(#{entity.questionCount}, #{entity.optMax}, #{entity.resMax}, #{entity.grade}, #{entity.schoolId}, #{entity.questionListNumber}, #{entity.questionListIdentifier}, #{entity.signTime}, #{entity.score})
on duplicate key update question_count = values(question_count) , opt_max = values(opt_max) , res_max = values(res_max) , grade = values(grade) , school_id = values(school_id) , question_list_number = values(question_list_number) , question_list_identifier = values(question_list_identifier) , sign_time = values(sign_time) , score = values(score)
